levels.name: Essence of Vigilance Tier 1
levels.description: Connect with the Essence of Vigilance and gain an advantage over resilience.
levels.instruction: Your connection to the Essence of Vigilance has given you greater combat abilities against resilience.

levels.name: Essence of Vigilance Tier 4
levels.description: Connect with the Essence of Vigilance and gain an advantage over resilience.
levels.instruction: Your connection to the Essence of Vigilance has given you greater combat abilities against resilience. Shattered Psyche can now be used on creatures of any essence.
